content: > i know there are only a million other > slouch hat patterns out there but i > haven t found one that works well for > me so i whipped up my own it s quick > & easy… and is great for bhds bad > hair days > > i have included instructions for both > child & adult sizes and included some > notes to customize the fit of your > super slouch this pattern was originally designed by danyel pink it is now available exclusively at oombawka design crochet > danyel pink has sold the full > copyright for this pattern and all > associated images to oombawka design > ltd ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2023 oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
